body_html: Also, note that if HDD is a bottleneck, then increasing the number of workers will only make it worse - the disk is 100% busy, but they're competing for files scattered across it, so the reads get even more random and degrade the performance.
body_text: Also, note that if HDD is a bottleneck, then increasing the number of workers will only make it worse - the disk is 100% busy, but they're competing for files scattered across it, so the reads get even more random and degrade the performance.
body: Also, note that if HDD is a bottleneck, then increasing the number of workers will only make it worse - the disk is 100% busy, but they're competing for files scattered across it, so the reads get even more random and degrade the performance.
